resources.string: Welcome to the Alzheimer\'s Awareness Quiz!
You will be asked 10 questions about the signs and symptoms of alzheimer\'s disease. \nAnswer each question to the best of your knowledge. \nYour responses will be scored at the end.

DISCLAIMER \nThis app was created to raise awareness and direct those that believe they or their loved one may be suffering from the early stages of alzheimer\'s disease to more information from the Alzheimer\'s Association. This quiz does not diagnose or treat any illness and is not endorsed by any medical professional or the Alzheimer\'s Association.
